short_summary: Correctional Service Canada requires 16000 pairs of inmate jeans and 24000 pairs over a period of 24 months.
description: Correctional Service Canada (CSC) has a requirement for Inmate Jeans in accordance with the Purchase Description CAG-8-9907-755/B. Firm Quantities: Item 1: 16000 pairs Firm Quantities: Item 2: 24000 pairs The requirement includes 'as and when requested' quantities for a period of 24 months from contract award: Item 3 - 16000 pairs.
full_summary:
### RFP for Jeans
#### Notice Number: 
21120-229293-RFP

#### Reference Number:
WS3840008680-Doc3892680975

#### Amendment Number:
5

#### Solicitation Number:
WS3840008680

#### Tender Closing Date:
Thursday, May 18, 2023, at 14:00

#### UNSPSC Code:
53101500 - Slacks and trousers and shorts

#### Procurement Category:
GD - Goods and Services

#### Procurement Method:
Competitive - Open bidding

#### Notice Type:
Request for Proposal

#### Selection Criteria:
Lowest Price

#### Description:
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) has a requirement for Inmate Jeans, as per Purchase Description CAG-8-9907-755/B. The required quantities are as follows:

* 16,000 pairs
* 24,000 pairs
* The requirement also includes “as and when requested” quantities for a period of 24 months from contract award.

Tendering procedures:
The tender process is open, allowing all interested suppliers to submit a bid.

Evaluation and selection:
Refer to Part 4 of the Solicitation Document for evaluation procedures and basis of selection.

Delivery:
The firm deliverables must be delivered to Laval, Quebec as follows:

* Item 1 to be delivered complete after contract award.
* Item 2 to be delivered complete 12 months after contract award.

Contract value:
The total value of the contract is expected to be over $[insert value]. The contract will be awarded to the supplier offering the lowest price.

To access the tender document, please visit the Government of Canada’s Tendering Procedures website.

#### Contact Information:
Inquiries should be directed to:
Fréchet Julien
Director, Market Access
SPAC
10th Floor, 11 Laurier St.
Place du Portage, Phase III
Gatineau, Québec K1A 0S5
Phone: [insert phone number]
Email: [insert email]
